text:
In @SundayIndy
1 The husband of President @CyrilRamaphosa's spokesperson, Khusela Diko, is among R2.2 b Covid-19 PPEs contracts beneficiaries. 
2 Eskom COO Jan Oberholzer must face a disciplinary hearing, says a report.
3 Calls for PSC DG to be probed for 
fraud and corruption. https://t.co/R0oMPMgPf9
